title: Himi 603
lyrics:
M.L.
1.
‘Eiki, neongo ko e hā
Pule a’au ‘oku fu’u e’a:
Te u ‘ahi’ahi ke talia,
“Ke fai Ho finangalo ia.”
2.
Kapau ‘e pule mai ‘a langi
Ke u fou pē ‘i ha fu’u mamahi;
Te u ‘ahi’ahi ke talia,
“Ke fai Ho finangalo ia.”
3.
Ka pule mai ke u tuēnoa,
Masiva he me’a manakoa:
Te u ahi’ahi ke talia,
“Ke fai ho finagalo ia.”
4.
Ka pule mai keu tukuange
‘Eku koloa, ‘a ‘Aisake;
Te u ‘ahi’ahi ke talia,
“Ke fai Ho finangalo ia.”
5.
Ka to’o ‘a ‘eku ‘amanaki,
Tapu ‘a e me’a ne u fie fai;
Te u ‘ahi’ahi ke talia,
“Ke fai Ho finangalo ia.”
6.
Ka pule ke u mahaki’ia,
Faka’ausino ke pekia:
Te u ‘ahi’ahi ke talia,
“Ke fai Ho finangalo ia.”
7.
‘Eiki, liliu ‘a hoku loto,
Ke u tui ai pē ki Ho’ poto;
Kae faingofua pē ke u talia,
“Ke fai Ho finangalo ia.” *
